Meta:Changelog.0.4.0: Attach to GameLaunched, perform scale calculation outside drawing routine
Meta:Changelog.0.5.0: Totally new overlay.json format, change loading & make more robust
Meta:Changelog.0.6.0: Preliminary support for content packs, optimize more things
Meta:Changelog.0.8.1: Fix for zoom, Add 'dover' command to help debugging, Internal optimizations
Meta:Changelog.0.9.0: Add more console commands, add support for internationalization
Meta:Changelog.0.10.0: Resize overlay on Window Resize event
